typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		rating as integer,
		rotten_tomatoes as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> moviestable
moviestable derive(genres = split(genres,'|')) ~> splitgenres
splitgenres foldDown(unroll(genres, genres),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		title,
		genre = genres,
		year,
		rating,
		rotten_tomatoes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> denormalisegenres
denormalisegenres sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> json
